root_object.name: AS GAM Add User to User Table

process_model.name: AS GAM Add User to User Table
process_model.description: Process to add user to provided table

expression_rules.name: AS_GAM_UT_FormatUserForCreation
expression_rules.description: Formats incoming data to see if creation, update or no action is needed for the user record

test_cases.test_name: (GSS) Null list of names - No return

called_by: AS GAM Add User to User Table

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_cdtDistinctOnField
expression_rules.description:
Returns only distinct CDT indices on a single field, returning the first index where there are multiples of the same value.

i.e. {{a: 1, b: 2}, {a: 1, b: 4}, {a: 5, b: 4}}, distinct on field "a" would return {{a: 1, b: 2}, {a: 5, b: 4}}

expression_rules.name: AS_GAM_QE_getUser
expression_rules.description: Returns user CDT based on the entity, entityType, and given filter set.

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField
expression_rules.description: Filters a CDT by a matching a single value or list of values in a single field, if a list is passed, all matches are returned

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_indexPath
expression_rules.description: Pass in a field (i.e. member[1].name) and this will index(index(index( for each field

data.sail_code:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)
data.definition:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GAM_APPREF_GSS_GETDATA_userType
expression_rules.description: Application reference to `AS_GSS_ENTRYPOINT_GETDATA_getUserType `

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_checkIfUserExists
expression_rules.description: Returns true if the user exists

data.sail_code:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
  and(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!user),
    isusernametaken(ri!user)
  )
)
data.definition:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
  and(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!user),
    isusernametaken(ri!user)
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_castToMapList
expression_rules.description: Casts the input to a map list

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_queryEntity
expression_rules.description: Helper rule to execute queries with minimal overhead, pass `returnType` based on the query purpose

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFields
expression_rules.description: Updates one or more fields of a CDT, with an optional input for indices

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_replaceNull
expression_rules.description: Returns nullableValue only if it is not null. Else returns replacementValue.

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_isBlank
expression_rules.description: Evaluates if the provided value is empty/blank. Returns True or False.

data.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
  length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0
)
data.definition:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
  length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0
)

test_cases.test_name: Array cast to Any Type with first value null

called_by: AS GAM Add User to User Table

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_distinct
expression_rules.description: Returns the distinct values from a list.

data.sail_code:
cast(
  typeof(ri!value),
  union({ri!value}, {ri!value})
)
data.definition:
cast(
  typeof(ri!value),
  union({ri!value}, {ri!value})
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GAM_APPREF_GSS_GETDATA_userEntity
expression_rules.description: Application reference to `AS_GSS_ENTRYPOINT_GETDATA_getUserEntity `

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_cdtDistinctOnFieldSingle
expression_rules.description: Called by AS_CO_UT_cdtDistinctOnField -- do not call this rule

data.sail_code:
append(
  ri!cdtIndices,
  index(rule!AS_CO_UT_returnCdtIndicesByMultipleFields(
    cdt: ri!cdt,
    fields: ri!fields,
    values: apply(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: ri!singleCdt,
        field: _
      ),
      ri!fields
    )
  ), 1, null)
)
data.definition:
append(
  ri!cdtIndices,
  index(rule!AS_CO_UT_returnCdtIndicesByMultipleFields(
    cdt: ri!cdt,
    fields: ri!fields,
    values: apply(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: ri!singleCdt,
        field: _
      ),
      ri!fields
    )
  ), 1, null)
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_enumForCount
expression_rules.description: Return an enumerator for the count of the input objects

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_typeCompare
expression_rules.description: Returns true if the two input types match

data.sail_code:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
  typeof(ri!value1) = typeof(ri!value2)
)
data.definition:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
  typeof(ri!value1) = typeof(ri!value2)
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_returnCdtIndicesByMultipleFields_handler
expression_rules.description: Used by rule `AS_CO_UT_returnCdtIndicesByMultipleFields`

data.sail_code:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Integer?list',
  intersection(
    tointeger(ri!previousIndices),
    rule!AS_CO_UT_returnCdtIndicesByField(
      cdt: ri!cdt,
      field: ri!field,
      value: ri!value
    )
  )
)
data.definition:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Integer?list',
  intersection(
    tointeger(ri!previousIndices),
    rule!AS_CO_UT_returnCdtIndicesByField(
      cdt: ri!cdt,
      field: ri!field,
      value: ri!value
    )
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_whereContains
expression_rules.description: Enhanced wherecontains() which avoids type-casting issues and properly handles for document and group types

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_returnCdtIndicesByField
expression_rules.description: Returns the indices of a CDT by a matching a single value or list of values in a single field, if a list is passed, all matches are returned

data.sail_code:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Integer?list',
  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
    values: ri!value,
    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
      cdt: a!flatten(ri!cdt),
      field: ri!field,
      indexDefault: null
    )
  )
)
data.definition:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Integer?list',
  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
    values: ri!value,
    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
      cdt: a!flatten(ri!cdt),
      field: ri!field,
      indexDefault: null
    )
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_FRM_getRuleReferenceOrNoOp
expression_rules.description: Returns either a rule reference to the input rule, or a no-operation if the rule does not exist, uses plugin function `rulereferencebyname()`

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank
expression_rules.description: A not() wrapped around AS_CO_UT_isBlank

data.sail_code:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
  not(rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!input))
)
data.definition:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
  not(rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!input))
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_returnCdtIndicesByMultipleFields
expression_rules.description: Returns the indices of a CDT by multiple fields and values for those fields (acts as an AND filter)

data.sail_code:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Integer?list',
  reduce(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_returnCdtIndicesByMultipleFields_handler(
      previousIndices: _,
      cdt: ri!cdt,
      field: _,
      value: _
    ),
    rule!AS_CO_UT_enumForCount(ri!cdt),
    merge(
      a!flatten(ri!fields),
      a!flatten(ri!values)
    )
  )
)
data.definition:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Integer?list',
  reduce(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_returnCdtIndicesByMultipleFields_handler(
      previousIndices: _,
      cdt: ri!cdt,
      field: _,
      value: _
    ),
    rule!AS_CO_UT_enumForCount(ri!cdt),
    merge(
      a!flatten(ri!fields),
      a!flatten(ri!values)
    )
  )
)

constants.name: AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
constants.description: OBJECT_ARRAY - Returns an array type of the CDT when passed to rule `AS_CO_UT_queryEntity`
